column5: ironwood, heres a quote from a buddy who came back 6.21 from o'sullivan; "The Clova road was bad, bad, bad this year. The trip in took 5 hours with the boat. The trip out took 4 hours. The road grader cut the first 1/3 of the road out but the last 1/3 (closest to hwy 115) was horrible. We had to hold speed down to 5-15 mph." he was pulling a 17.5' princecraft.
Thanks for the road report - the Clova road can be a trying experience for sure- how about a fishing report????? thanks
